sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../Components/Message' import Loader from '../Components/Loader' import { getOrderDetails} from '../Actions/orderActions' function Orderscreen({ match}) { const orderDetails = useSelector(state => state.orderDetails) const { order,loading, error } = orderDetails const orderId = match.params.id console.log(orderId) const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { if (!order || order._id !== Number(orderId)) { dispatch(getOrderDetails(orderId)) } }, [dispatch,order,orderId]) return loading? () : error? ({error}) :(

Order: {order.Id}

Shipping

Shipping: {order.shippingAddress.address}, {order.shippingAddress.city} {' '} {order.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {' '} {order.shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {order.paymentMethod}

{order.isPaid ? ( Paid on {order.paidAt} ) : ( Payment pending )}

Order Items

{order.orderItems.length === 0 ? Your order is empty : ( {order.orderItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} X ${item.price} = ${(item.qty * item.price).toFixed(2)} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Items: ${(order.totalPrice-order.taxPrice-order.shippingPrice).toFixed(2)} Shipping: ${order.shippingPrice} GST: ${order.taxPrice} Total: ${order.totalPrice}
) } export default Orderscreen
